original_text: Therefore the heavens above you have withheld the dew, and the earth has withheld its produce.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희로 말미암아 하늘은 이슬을 그쳤고 땅은 산물을 그쳤으며

sentences.original_text: Therefore the heavens above you have withheld the dew
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희 위의 하늘이 이슬을 거두었으며

sentences.original_text: and the earth has withheld its produce
